Profile.Headline: Technical Lead | Remote | Consultant | Ruby on Rails | DevOps
Profile.Summary: **Solution Achitect | AI & OpenAI Integrator | DevOps & Security Enthusiast | Debugging Pro**  I'm a Ruby on Rails developer who builds, secures, and scales end-to-end web applications, from the Linux server to the frontend UI. I thrive on creating systems that are not just functional, but intelligent, resilient, and easy to maintain. I specialize in end-to-end  application setups, handling everything from server provisioning and web server configuration (Nginx, Thin) to authentication (Devise, SAML), frontend customization (CKEditor 5, TinyMCE, Bootstrap), and deep service integrations (Twilio, Microsoft Graph, OpenAI).  🤖 On the AI front, I build smart features using OpenAI and vector search, enabling intelligent content generation, semantic search, and dynamic user experiences.  🔍 I'm also strong on the debugging and RCA side, whether it's Linux-level issues, webserver misconfigurations, Rails stack anomalies, or hard-to-trace performance bottlenecks. If it breaks, I fix it. If it’s unclear, I dig in until it’s not. For security and DevOps, I work with EC2, fail2ban, iptables, log compression, session hardening, and scalable deployment strategies, making sure what we build stays online and protected. Whether you need deep integration, tight security, AI features, or just a full-stack Rails app that works and keeps working, I'm here for it.

Job_Applicant_Saved_Answers.Question: Please submit a resume or LinkedIn profile

Recommendations_Received.Text: I inherited a product that was in dire need of repair and in search of someone to help me rescue the product. I was fortunate to have discovered Ranjan who quickly reversed engineered the application, document it, and lead the stabilization efforts.    Ranjan is a highly intelligent creative problem solver who knows how to get things done. He's game to tackle any challenge, a true professional, and a joy to work with.    I truly hope to work with Ranjan again in the future. It's rare to come across someone who excels in so many dimensions.    Thanks Ranjan!

i have been worked with him in 2 companies (Srishti & CastleRock) .  technically very sound , but not shown up .  very soft/cool guy. he has excellent knowledge in Ruby,Rails,Jquery,Shell Scripting and other open source technologies.

Recommendations_Received.Job Title: Full Stack Developer for Ruby On Rails, Javascript, TypeScript, React JS, Node JS and Html5
Recommendations_Received.Text: I am having a pleasant experience working with Ranjan in Sumeru Solutions, he is a quite mature and dedicated toward his professinal goals. He has a blanaced attitude toward life and work. A kind of person who has a attitude for hard work and is a very good team player. Ranjan is a person who can work for hours together untill a solution has arrived. He is a person who doesnt take "not possible" as a answer to any problem.

Profile_Summary:
💻 **Solution Achitect | AI & OpenAI Integrator | DevOps & Security Enthusiast | Debugging Pro**

I'm a Ruby on Rails developer who builds, secures, and scales end-to-end web applications, from the Linux server to the frontend UI. I thrive on creating systems that are not just functional, but intelligent, resilient, and easy to maintain.

🔧 I specialize in end-to-end  application setups, handling everything from server provisioning and web server configuration (Nginx, Thin) to authentication (Devise, SAML), frontend customization (CKEditor 5, TinyMCE, Bootstrap), and deep service integrations (Twilio, Microsoft Graph, OpenAI).

🤖 On the AI front, I build smart features using OpenAI and vector search, enabling intelligent content generation, semantic search, and dynamic user experiences.

🔍 I'm also strong on the debugging and RCA side, whether it's Linux-level issues, webserver misconfigurations, Rails stack anomalies, or hard-to-trace performance bottlenecks. If it breaks, I fix it. If it’s unclear, I dig in until it’s not.

🛡️ For security and DevOps, I work with EC2, fail2ban, iptables, log compression, session hardening, and scalable deployment strategies, making sure what we build stays online and protected.

🚀 Whether you need deep integration, tight security, AI features, or just a full-stack Rails app that works and keeps working, I'm here for it.

Recommendations_Given.Text: Rajeev is an extremely hardworking, self motivated and knowledgeable developer.I wish him best of luck for his future endeavor.

Neeraj and me are working in same project for around year. I found Neeraj very good in Test Driven Development  along with good knowledge of Ruby on Rails.He takes initiative in each and every small aspect in the project. He is a nice person to work with and also good asset to any team. He is flexible and confident.
